pages.text: The Diabolical Fungi, also known as the Devil's Tooth Mushroom, is a dark mana-generating flower that feeds on demon will saturating the air. This otherworldly organism converts the raw energy of demon will into Botania's mana, bridging two powerful magical systems.

Place this flower near areas with high demon will concentration. It will automatically consume will from the chunk and convert it to mana.$(br2)$(blood)Consumes:$() Up to 100 demon will per cycle$(br)$(animus)Produces:$() 250 mana per 1 will (configurable)$(br)$(animus)Stores:$() Up to 5000 mana internally

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: Every 2 seconds, the Diabolical Fungi attempts to consume demon will from its chunk. It will drain up to 100 will total per cycle, consuming proportionally from all available will types based on their relative abundance.$(br2)The more varied the types of will present, the more efficient the conversion becomes; each additional will type beyond the first grants a 10% mana bonus.

pages.title: Variety Bonus
pages.text: $(blood)Conversion Efficiency:$()$(br)• 1 will type: 100% base mana$(br)• 2 will types: 110% mana$(br)• 3 will types: 120% mana$(br)• 4 will types: 130% mana$(br)• 5 will types: 140% mana$(br2)This rewards creating diverse demon will environments rather than relying on a single type.

pages.title: Overgrowth Synergy
pages.text: When placed on $(animus)Botania's Enchanted Soil$() (soil that has had an Overgrowth Seed applied), the Diabolical Fungi's conversion rate is $(blood)doubled$().$(br2)This powerful synergy makes the fungi an excellent late-game mana generator for hybrid practitioners who have mastered both Blood Magic and Botania.

pages.title: Practical Usage
pages.text: The Diabolical Fungi works best in areas where demons have been recently slain or where Tartaric Gems are actively releasing will. Pair it with Blood Magic's demon will systems and Botania's mana distribution network for a self-sustaining hybrid setup.$(br2)When consuming will, the fungi produces a distinctive slurping sound and releases ghostly soul fire flames that rise upward; making it easy to identify active specimens.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: Conversion rate is configurable:$(br2)$(will)willToManaConversionRate:$() Controls mana produced per will consumed (default: 250 mana per will)$(br2)$(will)Requires:$() Both Blood Magic and Botania must be installed for this flower to function.
